The recession cone of a convex set is closed under addition.

lemma recessionCone_add_mem {n : Nat} {C : Set (EuclideanSpace Real (Fin n))} (hCconv : Convex Real C) {y y : EuclideanSpace Real (Fin n)} (hy : y Set.recessionCone C) (hy : y Set.recessionCone C) : y + y Set.recessionCone C := by have hconv : Convex Real (Set.recessionCone C) := recessionCone_convex (C := C) hCconv have hhalf : (1 / 2 : ) y + (1 / 2 : ) y Set.recessionCone C := by have hsum : (1 / 2 : ) + (1 / 2 : ) = 1 := by ring exact hconv hy hy (by norm_num) (by norm_num) hsum have hsum : (2 : ) ((1 / 2 : ) y + (1 / 2 : ) y) = y + y := by simp [smul_add, smul_smul] have hsum_mem : (2 : ) ((1 / 2 : ) y + (1 / 2 : ) y) Set.recessionCone C := recessionCone_smul_pos (C := C) hhalf (by norm_num) simpa [hsum] using hsum_mem
